summary: Cross Racial Features adds exactly that. Noses, Eye Shapes, Eye Colors, and Lips. Now for Males and Females! Use Orc eye colors on a Human! Human noses on Elves! Elf eyes on a Human! Cute! SKSE NOT REQUIRED.
descriptionHtml:
I created this mod as a very lightweight simple alternative to others that require SKSE. That being said I do not think that this mod is better than ECE. If you want more options that is the obvious choice.

-Affects all characters except Khajiit and Argonian.
-All eye shapes can be used on any race.
-All eye colors can be used on any race.
-All lips and noses can be used on any race.
-Doesn't change NPC's in game. You can use creation kit with this mod loaded to give them cross racial features though if you wish.

THINGS THIS MOD DOESN'T DO
-Add Elf ears to non Elves
-Add Orc mouths to non orcs
-Remove Orc mouths from Orcs
-This mod changes lips not mouths unfortunately.
-Not compatible with ECE unfortunately. :(
-Not compatible with modded/custom races.

INSTALLATION
Drop the file into your data folder. I recommend using NMM though it works seamlessly.

COMPATIBILITY
Tested and proven compatible with:

Ethereal Elven Overhaul
Race Menu

Should be compatible with any mod that doesn't affect face parts.
That means you can use any textures including ones for eyes. You can use any hair mod as well.
Not compatible with ECE unfortunately. :(
Not compatible with modded/custom races.

RECOMMENDED
ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33526//?

Mods in the screens:
Ethereal Elven Overhaul
Better Males
Women of Skyrim
CBBE
I use all the most popular hair mods at once (forgot which one I used in some of the screens)

I created this mod primarily for females. I use a lot of mods and this mod is compatible with all of them. SKSE is NOT required. Send me your screenshots! Endorse my mod! Lots of love nexus community. Thanks.
author: Moldi
